textAfterTable: Because sizing and cut will vary between brands, please use this chart as a general guide. If you are between sizes or need assistance selecting the proper size, please contact Customer Service Designer Since its inception in 2001, Joie has successfully filled a void in the contemporary market with its stylish, casual apparel. Joie clothing provides the modern, fashion-savvy customer with a global wardrobe that pays special attention to beautiful silhouettes and luxurious fabrics. Though the company got its start with its signature cargos, today it is best known for offering a wide range of quality apparel including feminine tops, dresses, and cashmere sweaters.
